application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by condition 3g (Submission of details - (g) New internal architectural joinery, such as doors, architraves, balustrading and skirtings, at a scale of 1:10, including section;) of listed building consent 23/04239 (Conversion of mixed-use listed building into single residential dwelling; replacement of mansard roof; replacement of windows; installation of solar panels; construction of external bin and cycle storage; external alterations, landscaping and other associated works; internal works including removal of modern fixtures and fittings; installation of partitions, and other associated internal works.)
